column4: I installed wine just a bit ago and did online forum instructions to install world of warcraft...the copying over from windows part at least...but when I try to run the game I get Segmentation fault.

I installed wine just a bit ago and did online forum instructions to install world of warcraft...the copying over from windows part at least...but when I try to run the game I get Segmentation fault.   Anyone know what to do?
anyone know another program like wine that is also free?
